Package boundary

package boundary
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminView
    This class represents the Admin View when using Admin Module
    BookedSeatView
    This class represents when the MovieGoer and selected a seat and showned the booked seat view with the details and information of the Movie and Price
    ConfigureSystemSettingView
    This class represents Configure System Setting View which is used by an Admin to change the ticket prices or adding a Holidayv
    CURMovieListingView
    This class represents the view for Admin when Create/Update/Remove movie listing is selected and Admin wishes to make changes to the corresponding information
    CURShowTimeView
    This class represents the view for Admin when Create/Update/Remove CinemaShowTime is selected and Admin wishes to make changes to the corresponding information
    EnterReviewView
    This class represents the view for MovieGoer To enter a review to a Movie
    ExploreCineplexesView
    This class represents the view when MovieGoer selects to view a List of All Cineplex
    ListTop5View
    This class represents the view for MovieGoer to list the top 5 Movie Either by ticket sales or movie review which the options will be enabled or disabled by Admin
    LoginView
    This class represents the view for User to Login, which is used when authenticated an Admin or a MovieGoer
    MovieGoerView
    This class represents the view for MovieGoer To View Movies or Cineplex or its own transaction history Only authenticated MovieGoer can view its transaction history
    MovieShowTimeView
    This class represents the view for MovieGoer when they selected a to Login, which is used when authenticated an Admin or a MovieGoer
    RegisterView
    This class represents the view for User to Register and new account, it can be an Admin or a MovieGoer
    SearchListMoviesView
    This class the View when User selected Explore Movies option A list of options will be available for User to further select
    SeatSelectionView
    This class represents when the MovieGoer selected a ShowTimeID and will be brought to see the Seating Layout of the CinemaShowTime
    TransactionHistoryView
    This class represents the view when MovieGoer is authenticated and selects to view it's transaction history
    TransactionView
    This class represents the view for MovieGoer when User Confirms the Booked Seat, will be shown the Transaction details made.
    ViewMovieDetailView
    This class represents the view for MovieGoer selects a Movie and will be shown all the description of Movie attributes
